author: jgm
content: Only problem with those transactions was that the base fee was too low so you had to wait for it to drop down before your transactions could be included.

author: chris2_2_2
content: What I think happened was that it was high enough for some of them to get through into the block but others at the same gas that were pushed didnâ€™t and then gas rose

author: jgm
content: https://etherscan.io/tx/0x42459cbb57a07ba821f478c4125421194f83cd9c7539be8daddc60027ac66ba8 was where things stalled.  Once the base fee dropped back low enough to include this the rest sent through pretty quickly.

author: chris2_2_2
content: It works but also so many complaints everytime it happebs

author: jgm
content: Looks like the txs are being sent with the current base fee as the max fee, which gives no leeway in the case of base fee rising.  Consider setting max base fee to be the current base fee + 30% or similar.
